sentences.en: A set that begins with a caret (^) matches any character not included in the set.
sentences.cn: 以脱字符号 (^) 为开头的集合将匹配集合中不包括的所有字符。

sentences.en: Cancels the current selection moving the caret to the anchor point.
sentences.cn: 将插入符号移动到定位点处,取消当前所选内容.

sentences.en: Inserts a line break at the current caret position.
sentences.cn: 在当前插入符号位置插入一条分隔线.

sentences.en: Mode m: Make the caret (^) and dollar sign ($)match at the start and end of each line, for example, after and before line breaks embedded in the source string.
sentences.cn: 模式 m：使插入符号 (^) 和美元符号 ($) 在每一行的开始和结尾相匹配，例如，在源字符串中嵌入前后换行符。

sentences.en: Move the caret down one line, extending the column selection.
sentences.cn: 将插入符号下移一行, 扩展列的选定范围.

sentences.en: Move the caret to the end of the line, extending the selection.
sentences.cn: 将插入符号移动到行尾, 扩展选定范围.

sentences.en: Move the caret to the last line in view, extending the selection.
sentences.cn: 将插入符号移动到视图的最后一行, 扩展选定范围.

sentences.en: Move the caret to the matching brace, extending the selection.
sentences.cn: 将插入符号移动到匹配的括号处, 扩展选定范围.

sentences.en: Move the caret to the start of the document, extending the selection.
sentences.cn: 将插入符号移动到文档开头, 扩展选定范围.

sentences.en: Move the caret up one line, extending the selection.
sentences.cn: 将插入符号上移一行, 扩展选定范围.

sentences.en: Move the caret up one page, extending the selection.
sentences.cn: 将插入符号上移一页, 扩展选定范围.

sentences.en: Moves the caret down one page, extending the selection.
sentences.cn: 将插入符号向下移动一页, 扩展所选内容.

sentences.en: Moves the caret to the end of the document, extending the selection.
sentences.cn: 将插入符号移动到文档结尾, 扩展所选内容.

sentences.en: Moves the caret to the end of the line, extending the selection.
sentences.cn: 将插入符号移动到行尾, 扩展所选内容.

sentences.en: Moves the caret to the last line in view, extending the selection.
sentences.cn: 将插入符号移动到视图的最后一行, 扩展所选内容.

sentences.en: Moves the caret to the start of the line, extending the selection.
sentences.cn: 将插入符号移动到行首, 扩展所选内容.

sentences.en: Moves the caret up one page, extending the selection.
sentences.cn: 将插入符号向上移动一页, 扩展所选内容.

sentences.en: When a DocumentCommand executes, it starts by updating the Position corresponding to the caret (the vertical bar cursor bar).
sentences.cn: 当执行 DocumentCommand 时，首先会更新与插入符号（垂直的光标条）相应的 Position。

trans.tran_cn: 脱字号，补字号，补字符号
